description: Defines a dynamic type jump control that will change jump properties based on the speed modifier of the mob.
title: Jump Dynamic

distance_scale.title: Distance Scale
distance_scale.description: The multiplier applied to horizontal velocity when jumping.

height.title: Height
height.description: The force applied vertically when jumping.

jump_delay.title: Jump Delay
jump_delay.description: Amount of ticks between sequential jumps.

fast_skip_data.title: Fast Skip Data
fast_skip_data.description: Used when travelling quickly with skip movement
